snippet: The company said it would bring new models to the United States and invest $7 billion in North American production.
abstract: Volkswagen plans to become world's top-selling automaker within next four years, but its lackluster sales in United States have been significant drag on meeting that goal; says it will bring new models to the United States and invest $7 billion in North American production.
lead_paragraph: The company said it would bring new models to the United States and invest $7 billion in North American production.

headline.main: Tepid U.S. Sales Are a Drag on Volkswagen’s Ambitions
headline.print_headline: Poor U.S. Sales Are a Drag on Volkswagen’s Ambitions

keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
keywords.name: subject
